scripts.smoke: cross-env BROWSER=chrome TAG="@smoke" npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.js
scripts.regression: cross-env BROWSER=chrome TAG="@regression" npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.js
scripts.web: cross-env BROWSER=chrome TAG="@web" npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.js
scripts.api: cross-env BROWSER=chrome TAG="@api" npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.js
scripts.regressioninheadless: cross-env BROWSER=chrome TAG="@regression" npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.headless.js
